author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Execute more tests under various execution policy modes.

----------------

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan   Can you see if this is still needed?  I know I added tests for allsigned.

title: Add test to execute under various execution policies
